normalized: on a certain mission, my childhood friend, yukikaze, and my older sister, rinko, had infiltrated the underground city of yomihara.
it was for the purpose of rescuing yukikaze's mother, mizuki shiranui, a taimanin who had gone missing a few years earlier.
the lusty city of yomihara, which the powers of neither the government nor the taimanin reached, was rumoured to be the closest in japan to the criminal underworld.
it was a mission where considerable hardship had been anticipated for the pair, who were expected to be the aces of the next generation.
after all, the only women who were allowed to be in yomihara were slaves and prostitutes.
because of that, the pair had snuck into the shady city by disguising themselves as prostitutes, under the guidance of a slave trader.
however, that had been an error of judgement, and an enemy trap.

the pair―who had pushed themselves too far, and been caught in the enemy's scheme―had entered into a magical contract from which they could not escape, and undergone remodelling through the medical technology of hell, with the aim of becoming genuine slave prostitutes.

in other words, bodily remodelling that made them constantly horny due to an excessive use of a special aphrodisiac, and brainwashing of their subconsciouses, which would 『destroy their reason so that they experience sex, or equivalent sexual acts, as pleasure, and supreme joy.
the pair had tried to accomplish their mission, even in such severe circumstances.
二人に少し遅れてヨミハラに潜入した俺はそのことを知って、アサギ隊長に任務の中止を強く要請した。
on the brink of being turned into full slave prostitutes, the pair had been rescued by captain asagi.
by a hair's breadth.
however, that signified the failure of their mission.
it had remained a stain that the pair, who had been experiencing smooth sailing as taimanin of a new generation, could never get rid of.
but, luckily, they had both been able to receive medical treatment from kiryuu sabato, a demonologist who cooperated with the taimanin.
neither of them would talk about it in detail.

however, based on what captain asagi told me, because a dangerous drug had been used on them, their aphrodisiac-overdosed bodies were not fully cured yet, but they appeared to have recovered to the point of merely having 「sensitivebodies」.
as for the brainwashing of their subconsciouses, they both had a tenacious strength of will, so it had been completely cured.
in the course of the treatment process, mysterious microchips had been discovered in the pair's bodies.
the microchips were devised so that their internal data would disappear if one tried to analyze them.
while they were searching for a means of data analysis, they had identified the microchips' manufacturer.
it was washizu material co.
, a corporation under the umbrella of the washizu group.

they discovered that it was one of the companies that washizu shigeru, the retired former chairman of the washizu group, directly controlled, and, similarly, that a research facility for washizu material existed within the grounds of seishuu academy, where he served as headmaster.
and, one more thing.
it had become clear that there was a relationship between washizu shigeru and that yazaki muneichi.
yazaki muneichi was the son of washizu shigeru's younger sister, hisako (deceased - illness), and the two had had a nephew-uncle relationship.
the dots connected to form a line.
there was no doubt that there was something in seishuu academy.
captain asagi had concluded so, and planned the infiltration of the school.
had washizu shigeru been taking part in yazaki's illegal business?
could they obtain a clue to the still-missing mizuki shiranui?
in order to investigate that――
first, kousaka shizuru had infiltrated the place as a teacher.
next, i had been given the order to slip in as a student.
one day, i had been summoned to the medical room in gosha academy's underground facility.
the one who had called me was my homeroom teacher, yatsu murasaki-sensei, who played the role of commander for lots of taimanin.
murasaki-sensei had, for the first time, shown me one of the microchips that they had taken out from yukikaze and rinko-nee's bodies.

name: murasaki
normalized: look closely at this microchip and commit it to memory.
if you discover one, it's your vital mission to retrieve it.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes!

name: murasaki
normalized: don't get overeager for yukikaze and rinko's sakes, akiyama.
if washizu shigeru was the mastermind, this will be a considerably dangerous mission.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i understand.
in addition to working together with shizuru-san, who has already snuck in, i will proceed with the search discreetly.

name: murasaki
normalized: if battle becomes necessary, i'll dispatch yukikaze or rinko, or both.

name: murasaki
normalized: remember, battle is the last resort.
the success or failure of this mission is dependent on “grass”.
keep your wits about you!
」(tl: a type of ninja or mission focused around infiltration and reconnaissance.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yes!
the art of memorization was obvious knowledge for a taimanin.
it was just a black chip, with no model number listed or anything, but i etched its shape into my mind.
murasaki-sensei suddenly took something out from her breast pocket.

name: murasaki
normalized: this is an amulet i received from my brother on the occasion of my first battle.
take it!
murasaki-sensei's older brother.
i had never met him, but i had heard the rumours.
yatsu kurou, discharged from his former ranger corps after losing both eyes on a mission.
his loss of eyesight had been the impetus for awakening his anti-demon powers.
nowadays, he was referred to as captain asagi's right-hand man, and, as a late-bloomer kind of taimanin, he was a ray of hope for people whose powers were slow to manifest, like me.
knowing that, murasaki-sensei had placed her precious amulet in my care.

name: tatsurou
normalized: thank you very much.
i'll be sure to return it.

name: murasaki
normalized: obviously.
put even one scratch on it, and i will personally make you take hellish remedial lessons.
murasaki-sensei rarely made jokes like that.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i'll take care of it.
well, from here on, akiyama tatsurou will depart on his miss――
hold on!
the door opened, and a figure in a white gown suddenly appeared in the room.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
it was the demonologist, kiryuu sabato-san, someone i was indebted to for having treated yukikaze and rinko-nee.

name: murasaki
normalized: you bastard, what have you come here for?!
bogoh!

name: kiryuu
normalized: hogeeh!

name: tatsurou
normalized: whoa!
all of a sudden, murasaki-sensei had walloped kiryuu-san's face.
it was a completely merciless strike.
gusha!
kiryuu-san was slammed into the wall with all her strength.

name: kiryuu
normalized: the first love punch of today, i'm so happy!
my honey, murasaki!

name: murasaki
normalized: who's “my honey”?!
die!
dogahh!
this time, she kicked him as hard as she could.

name: kiryuu
normalized: hebuu!
kiryuu-san bent his body into a く shape, and was blown away again.

name: kiryuu
normalized: ow ow… it hurts, but it feels good!
kuhahahahahahaha!
kiryuu-san stood up, while laughing loudly, like he was truly happy.
well, um, his neck was broken in a strange direction, and his internal organs were protruding from him, but――oh.
he went back to normal by himself.
he was regenerating somehow.

name: kiryuu
normalized: this pain is love, isn't it?
i feel your love so much it hurts!

name: murasaki
normalized: it's nothing like love.
i'm having an important conversation right now.
get out!
you're an eyesore!
murasaki-sensei opened her eyes wide and shouted.
it was such an angry look that i started wanting to run away a little.
the genius demonologist, kiryuu sabato.

he, who was once hostile to the taimanin, had been killed by murasaki-sensei――indeed, having been killed was said to have been the impetus for him awakening to his ultimate fear of, and deep longing for, her.

despite having provided hellish medical technology as the head of this research lab (which doubled as a sick bay) ever since, i had heard that he kept having his undead body broken by murasaki-sensei.
it was the first time i had witnessed that scene.
he really wouldn't die, would he?

name: kiryuu
normalized: pig boy over there!
kiryuu-san pointed sharply at me.
eh?
me?

name: tatsurou
normalized: wh, what is it?

name: kiryuu
normalized: i hear you're about to go on a mission for the sake of those two pig bitches i treated, yes?

name: kiryuu
normalized: that's the spirit!
now that's love!
it doesn't come close to my love for murasaki, though.
hahahahaha!

name: tatsurou
normalized: okay…
i was a little offended by being called pig boy, but since he had saved yukikaze and rinko-nee, and i also didn't want to have too much to do with him, i nodded uncertainly.

name: murasaki
normalized: shut up!
what did you come here for?!

name: kiryuu
normalized: what a stupid question, murasaki.
you can't give birth to my child with an attitude like that, can you?

name: murasaki
normalized: who's giving birth?!

name: kiryuu
normalized: kuhahahahahaha!
i'm saying, the genius kiryuu sabato is going to give his blessing to a helpless pig who fights for love!

name: murasaki
normalized: blessing?!
what idiotic thing would a man like you do?!
kiryuu-san grinned at murasaki-sensei, who knit her brows as much as she could, and suddenly held my head in his hands.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?

name: kiryuu
normalized: i'm going to give you this.
kiryuu-san slipped me something, so that it wouldn't be seen by murasaki-sensei.
it was a tiny bottle the size of my little finger.
the bottle's colour was dark, and i couldn't tell what was inside it.

name: tatsurou
normalized: thank you very much.
but, what is this?
kiryuu-san didn't answer that, and

name: kiryuu
normalized: in exchange, i'll take that amulet of murasaki's that you're holding.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?!
b, but, murasaki-sensei gave this to…

name: kiryuu
normalized: what are you saying?
the amulet that murasaki's had since the time of her first battle… don't you understand that i, who am bound to murasaki by eternal love, am the one who deserves to have that?

name: tatsurou
normalized: well, it's not that i do or don't understand, but willfully giving away something loaned to you by someone is――eh?
what had he done, and how?
before i knew it, murasaki-sensei's amulet was in kiryuu-san's hands.

name: murasaki
normalized: what are you doing, so secretly?!
akiyama, get away from that guy!
i'm going to turn that trash into mincemeat right now!
she was saying unsettling things, and i didn't want to see something like that before i departed.
murasaki-sensei, you're a little crazy, aren't you?

name: tatsurou
normalized: come on, kiryuu-san, please give that back.

name: kiryuu
normalized: i'm not just saying to hand it over.
i'm saying, i'm gonna swap it for something more useful.

name: kiryuu
normalized: if you open that when you're really in trouble, it will definitely come in handy.
charms like this, which are the fruit of superstition, aren't something you need, are they?

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's not what i mean…

name: kiryuu
normalized: what?
are you saying you don't feel like repaying the favour to me, after i treated the bodies of your precious sows?
what a pig you are.
and yet you're murasaki's student?
it was no use with this person.
what i said didn't get through to him at all.

name: kiryuu
normalized: negotiations complete.
so long, brave pig boy!
i wish you luck!
kuaahahahahahahahaha!

name: tatsurou
normalized: uh…
kiryuu-san left, with laughter so loud that it echoed all over the place.
unwillingly, i had been made to exchange murasaki-sensei's amulet for that strange little vial.

name: murasaki
normalized: akiyama, nothing strange was done to you, right?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: uh… yeah.
obviously unable to say “the amulet you lent me got taken,” i just nodded.

name: murasaki
normalized: good.
that undead bastard.
akiyama, you have yukikaze and rinko.
try your hardest not to be affected by that idiot.
okay?

name: tatsurou
normalized: i won't.
in the end, i didn't understand very well, but, just like that, i had been put on the seishuu academy infiltration mission.
that was two weeks ago.
